name: 3D ESCAPE ROOM 2
description:
------------------------------------------

Look for clues in the room and try to escape!

There are two modes: Easy and Normal.

------------------------------------------

It is a simple escape game.

------------------------------------------

[Genre] 3D ESCAPE GAME 2

[Feature] Search / mystery

[Difficulty]Easy/Normal

[Play time]60min〜 (short)

[Recommended age] 12 years old and up

[Software]Unreal Engine 5

[Author] ENOMOTO NOUKI
